TopicTitle: ILS Proton Launches Eutelsat 9b live today (29-Jan @ 5:00 PM Eastern)

Articles.Content:
Follow the link to the live broadcast: http://eutelsat9b.imgondemand.com/

Other missions specs are here: http://www.ilslaunch.com/newsroom/news-releases/media-advisory-ils-proton-launch-eutelsat-9b
Unfortunately, this launch takes place at night over there so it'll just be a pretty first few seconds and then watching a orange ball.
